name: Name
aboutDescription: The city of Recife has great potential for growth when it comes to tourism, as the city offers a range of attractions and tourist attractions to visitors. Aiming for such growth, we decided to create an application/website that would provide tourist attractions, whether public or private. Where there were not the same forms of interaction with users, in which they would evaluate places and also give tips, providing specialized information about the places, making the person using the application informed about that place.
